Specific Details: As a landholder in the area, we wanted to have a general discussion on the proposed changes to the Draft Celbridge Local Area Plan 2017 - 2023 and the merits of reconsidering some of the changes including reinstating the zoning at Oldtown that was proposed in the original draft of the LAP that was put on public display from Tuesday 13th December 2016 - Friday 3rd February 2017.
